ygData.subject: Re: My 2 cents on the status of EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: ... servers in eq Man, whats with you and switching servers?  Think of it as in Star Trek. They have the prime directive, not to interfere with other cultures.
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Core Leader" <coreleader@...>
>
>around... And besides, you won't be able to switch servers there anyways!
>that and other and just play the game. Look at UO, you can't switch servers
>there... Can you??? Hell no and people still play it, you can't switch
servers in eq

Man, whats with you and switching servers? Think of it as in Star Trek.
They have the
prime directive, not to interfere with other cultures. Well, EQ isn't that
extreme, but
if you have a server that's been around for a year, you'll have a whole
bunch of lv50
guys switching to the new server bringing thousands and thousands of plat
(among other things)

That does two things, money/items leaving the old server screws up the
economy there, and money
going into the new server screws up the economy there.

> ... Can you??? Hell no and people STILL play it. So if some

Thats because its a non-issue.

Suppose for a moment you had good communiation with your friends before
starting a character.
Then you could all pick a server and thats that.

---------------------

About the protest. I share the same concerns as every other enchanter so
I'm going to join
in. I'm just wondering about that letter we should all send to verant.
Did anyone actually write
one?

Thanks
Azboklin the enchanter
